interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Moisturizing Shampoo Bar | For Curly Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance |Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste
Review Date: 2022/01/15
Store: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'}
Review Text: I have curly and wavy hair and this bar shampoo a lids plastic bottles while providing an excellent shampoo experience. It lathers well and leaves my hair feeling soft and silky. My hair is silver and it doesn’t leave any unanticipated stain of color, but leave my hair bright and shiny. It is gentle on my scalp. Couldn’t ask for anything better.
Review Title: Love this solid bar shampoo
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups YRMJK ['MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups'] {'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.57 Pounds', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '887702050430', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'} This bath pillow has made soaking much more pleasant. The suction cups really hold in place and the pillow cradles my head very comfortably. It is easy to keep clean and a perfect addition to my bathing. It was also a very good value price-wise. I am most pleased with this purchase. Excellent bath pillow with perfect suction Nice 'n Easy Permanent Color 9G Light Golden Blonde 1 ea (Pack of 3) Clairol ['Product Description', "The secret to our natural looking color is Clairol's exclusive ColorBlend Technology, which expertly blends 3 complementary tones into every shade. The result? Natural looking color that's perfectly true to you!", 'From the Manufacturer', 'Get a shade that’s your most true, most you. Thanks to Color Blend Technology,', 'Nice ’n Easy', 'gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon. Nice ‘n Easy layers tones and highlights to make over your color. Every shade has our exclusive Color Blend Technology, combining rich tones with contouring highlights in just one step. Expert improvements in all golden shades give you color with high-def dimension and less brassiness. You’ll get dimensional, true-to-you hair color and 100% gray coverage no matter which shade you choose. It’s color that simply comes to life.', 'Expert Highlights & Lowlights in One Simple Step', 'Get color so true, all they see is you. Nice ‘n Easy gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon, bringing your look to life. Our expert Color Blend Technology enhances the natural variations in your hair, for a shade that’s true to you.', 'Key Features', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', '100% gray coverage', '100% gray coverage', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Types of Hair Color', 'Compare Types of Clairol hair color.', 'Brand # of Shades Gray Coverage Color Type Color Lasts Works In Formula', "Nice 'n Easy Perfect 10", '24 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 10 minutes Micropearls forhigh-gloss color', "Nice 'n Easy", '42 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyfor highlights & lowlights', 'Color Blend Foam', '23 100% Permanent Foam Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyin a drip-free foam', "Nice 'n Easy Root Touch-Up", '18', 'formulated to matchany shade', '100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 3 weeks 10 minutes More shade choices,to match any shade,even salon color', '*', 'Natural Instincts', '23 Up to 50% Demi-PermanentCrème Color Up to 28 shampoos 10 minutes Clinically provenhealthier', '**', 'color withno ammonia', 'Natural Instincts Vibrant', '13 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 weeks 10 minutes Anitoxidants helpfight damage', '* Among leading retail permanent shade and pre-formulated salon color** Natural Instincts non-permanent Level 2 vs. leading Triple protection permanent Level 3 color crème: based on amount of surface damage', 'Meet Your Perfect Match', 'Take the guesswork out of gorgeous. Try our quick tool and we’ll give you personalized, expert shade recommendations. Visit Clairol.com/MyShade.', 'Vibrant, Healthy-Looking Color', 'Enjoy stunning, healthy-looking color for up to 8 weeks.', 'view larger'] {'Color': 'light golden blonde', 'Brand': 'Clairol', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 6.5 x 3.7 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'HFC Prestige International U.S. LLC'} I was looking forward to trying this new Clairol "Sun Kissed" Natural Light Golden Blond haircolor and was hoping for great results. It begain with a very roomy pair of applicator gloves (man-sized) and an easy to pour solution into the applicator bottle containing the developer. I have been coloring my hair for most of my life and I applied the product and left to sit at my computer while the color did its thing. I was pleased that it didn't have a terrible odor and that it didn't drip. Those were two great positives. I did not look in the mirror until I renetered the bathroom and was shocked to see that the stuff on my head had turned a dark reddish shade. I was hopeful that it would wash off in the shower and that my hair would appear a light golden blond as advertised and it did. While the change from my former product results gave me a surprise, it actually flatters my skin tone and I am glad I gave it a try. Will continue using it because I love the new shade on me. I added it to my Subscribe and Save products.

My hair is mow varigated strawberry blond, but my hair was always varigated because some parts are white, some parts are grey, some parts I really can't see (the back of my head); it is more strawberry blond than golden blond.

I suspect that one's results will depend upon your own hair. I actually find the change refreshing. Natural Light Golden Blond Results on My Hair LOT OF 4 AVON GLIMMERSTICKS WATERPROOF EYELINER SMOKEY GREY AVON {'Brand': 'AVON', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 2.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '888761116754', 'Manufacturer': 'Avon'} Really like these eyeliner sticks in hard to find gray color. Easy to apply and long lasting Great value in hard to find gray eyeliner pencils Yes To Face Wipes for Women and Men, Sensitive Facial Cleansing Wipes for use as a Make Up Remover, Cleaning, Soothing, Cucumbers Aloe Vera (Pack of 2) Yes To ["Yes To Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes gently remove dirt, sweat and makeup (eye makeup too!) without the need to rinse. Whether you're out and about, going for a run, or having a late night, these wipes make it a snap to refresh on-the-go. Packed with green superfoods these all-natural, biodegradable wipes naturally refresh and rejuvenate all-in-one. Stay gorgeous, and go from zero to clean in seconds! Snap up the lid and snatch out a towelette! Gently glide across your face and neck. Feel refreshed? You should- your skin is clean, revitalized and nourished- in just a snap! These 95% natural, oil-free, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic wipes are made with compostable, FSC certified fabric. They are petroleum free, SLS free, paraben free, and cruelty-free. Say Yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes! These 2 pack wipes are specifically sold by the manfucaturer. We can&rsquo. INGREDIENTS Water, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativas (Cucumber) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt), Carpylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance."] {'Brand': 'Yes To', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Compostable Warning', 'Unit Count': '60 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '4.6 x 3.75 x 5.5 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1024734', 'UPC': '815921024734', 'Manufacturer': 'Yes To Inc.', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Great makeup remover cloths for use at home or on the go. Soothing and hypoallergenic. Removes eye makeup easily and leaves skin feeling fresh and clean. Great for travel. Great for removing makeup and for travel or on the go use LaClaire Foaming Botanical Facial Cleanser with Enriched Antioxidant Botanicals - Nourishing pH Balanced Face Wash (50 ml/1.65 oz), Made in the USA LaClaire ['A gentle foaming cleanser utilizing natural beneficial antioxidant botanicals to draw out impurities, excess oil and pollutants. Our foaming cleanser removes debris without disrupting skin’s delicate PH balance. Use our cleanser to detoxify, purify and condition the skin’s natural barrier.'] {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 5.5 x 1.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '891040000682', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} This is a lovely gentle foam that removed my makeup and prepared my skin for a good night's sleep. It comes in a very small container, but a little bit goes a long way. It feels rich and very soothing and is made of many botanical ingedients. WHile the directions suggest that one avoid eyes, I didn't and kept them tightly shut while washing my face and then rinsing it thoroughly. Gentle Foam Removes Makeup Including Eueliner and Mascara Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count HDY {'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'} I like to change my brush head frequently. This replacement brush is excellent and cleaned my teeth perfectly. My grandfather was a dentist and instilled in me the desire to keep my teeth and gums in good health. These replacement brushes are every bit as effective as the name brand ones. Equal to name brand replacement brushes 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day SIKEMAY {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} This mascara came beautifully packaged and in an aquamarine tube. However, there is no list of ingredients and it comes from China. I would like to now it is cruelty-free and what is in its ingredients. While it did a good job of being mascara and has a nice applicator brush, not knowing what is in it makes me skeptical. Works well but.... MainBasics Headband with Buttons for Face Masks (Gray) MainBasics {'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'MainBasics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 3.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '790887351233'} I wear hearing aids and the over the ear masks get tangled up with my very expensive aids. If I added a pair of glasses, it is beyond uncomfortable. This band is the perfect solution I can protect my hearing aids, wear a mask, and my sunglasses. The ear loops on the mask attache to the buttons on either side of the headband. It also keeps the preparation on my forehead from rolling down my face. Thank you for this great design! Great for hearing aid wearers Rhinestone Crystal Padded Headband Bejewled Statement Wide Hairband Charm Bridal Wedding Party Headwear Hair Hoop Hair Accessorie (rainbow) JERTOCLE {'Color': 'Rainbow', 'Material': 'Vinyl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'JERTOCLE', 'Size': '5 5 Inch', 'Package Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.49 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LECE', 'UPC': '783911261387'} Made for a very big head. It is pretty and heavy, but much to big for my head. It is it’s length that’s the problem. Pretty but made for big headed women MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack) MOSTORY {'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long last, Crease proof, Blendable', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.49 x 0.87 inches; 5.11 Ounces'} This is a very funky fun collection of glitter eyeshadow. This is for those who want to add a lot of glamour to their makeup and are bold, young and fashion forward. In these days of mask wearing, why not make a statement with your eyes since your lips are hidden? Bold glimmer eyeshadow Pippa Of London Magic Star Eyeshadow Powder Pencil, Long Lasting, Blendable Eye Make Up Stick Pippa Of London {'Color': 'Chalfont 303 – a shimmering shade of pearl', 'Brand': 'Pippa Of London', 'Item Form': 'Stick, Pencil, Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.25 x 0.83 x 0.75 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Pippa of London', 'Country of Origin': 'United Kingdom'} This is a fabulous eyeshadow. The color, Chalfont 303, is very light and the sheen is so pretty and long lasting. It didn’t sink into crevices but stayed in place all day. Since it comes in a pencil form, it is super easy to apply in all the right places. It really accentuated the appearance of my eyes and is gentle to my delicate skin. The area around my eyes looked as good at night as it did when I applied the product in the morning. This eyeshadow is a winner! Superb eyeshadow in pencil form, long lasting and easy to use GLOW BOOSTER SERUM Catrice {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Glow', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Item Form': 'Serum'} I use this serum on my face and neck every morning after my shower. I find it gives my skin a healthy look and minimizes wrinkles. I no longer bother with foundation but must use blush and eye makeup. The included eyedropper dispenser makes it very easy to dispense and use. I love the way my skin feels after using just a tiny bit of this serum. A little goes a long way. Excellent Skin Serum Oval Large Makeup Brushes Fast Application Liquid Cream Powder Foundation (Rose Gold 1) LAMJAD {'Brand': 'LAMJAD', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 3.07 x 1.61 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '714403137835'} This is a very soft and fine makeup smoothing applicator to eliminate streaks. It leaves my skin liking natural and healthy. The brush can bewahren to keep it clean. Soft and. Comfortable for smoothing makeup The Vegan Glow Quinoa Protein Shampoo Bar | EWG Verified | Vegetable proteins from Quinoa & Soybeans The Vegan Glow {'Package Dimensions': '2.91 x 2.91 x 1.34 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Having good quality shampoo in bars is a wonderful innovation. This is a way to eliminate plastics from your bathroom. The shampoo foams well and leaves my hair shiny and nice. Do your little bit to help reduce plastic waste and try this bar shampoo. Also, it you happen to travel, it is perfect for your carryons. Love Bar Shampoo Vegan Bloomeffects - Natural Tulip Dew Face Cream | Cruelty-Free, Non-Toxic, Clean Beauty (1.7 oz | 50 ml) Bloomeffects {'Brand': 'Bloomeffects', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 3.27 x 2.91 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850006566419'} I look for cruelty-free make-up products and this sure fits the bill. It is a wonderful facial product that makes my skin look and feel both soft and supple. This is an excellent product and I highly recommend it for all skin types. Wonderful and Soothing B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Moisturizing Shampoo Bar | For Curly Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance |Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'} I have curly and wavy hair and this bar shampoo a lids plastic bottles while providing an excellent shampoo experience. It lathers well and leaves my hair feeling soft and silky. My hair is silver and it doesn’t leave any unanticipated stain of color, but leave my hair bright and shiny. It is gentle on my scalp. Couldn’t ask for anything better. Love this solid bar shampoo
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Bathing and Facial Comfort:** The user prioritizes comfort during bath time and facial care, favoring soothing, gentle, and cruelty-free products that enhance skin softness and suppleness.

- **Practicality and Eco-friendliness:** They value functional, eco-friendly solutions, increasingly opting for sustainable products that align with their ethical values, particularly those that are cruelty-free, non-toxic, and minimize plastic use.

- **Value Consciousness:** The user seeks good value for money, balancing quality with price in their purchasing decisions, while embracing environmentally-friendly benefits.

- **Positive Experience Expectation:** They consistently expect enhancements to their experience from products, reflected in high satisfaction with recent purchases.

- **Emphasis on Quality:** A focus on high-quality, effective products remains a priority for relaxation and personal care, particularly items that are easy to use.

- **Self-Care and Experimentation:** Their willingness to explore rejuvenating beauty options showcases a commitment to self-expression, enhancing their skincare and haircare routines.

- **Accessibility Focus:** The user emphasizes convenience, catering to busy lifestyles while ensuring comfort and accessibility in their product choices.

- **Health and Hygiene Awareness:** Their holistic approach to personal care includes an emphasis on health-conscious products, particularly in skincare.

- **Ingredient Transparency Needs:** Desire for ingredient transparency and ethical formulations underscores their preference for products with clear ingredient listings and cruelty-free certifications.

Overall, the user maintains a strong focus on comfort, practicality, sustainability, and ethical values, integrating health-conscious elements into their personal care routine while favoring effective, eco-friendly products that enhance their self-care experience.
